Package net.royalur.rules.state

Class RolledGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.rules.state.GameState<P,S,R>
net.royalur.rules.state.OngoingGameState<P,S,R>
net.royalur.rules.state.ActionGameState<P,S,R>
net.royalur.rules.state.RolledGameState<P,S,R>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
R - The type of roll that was made in this game state.
public class RolledGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll> extends ActionGameState<P,S,R>
A game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.

  • Constructor Details

    • RolledGameState

      public RolledGameState(@Nonnull Board<P> board, @Nonnull S lightPlayer, @Nonnull S darkPlayer, @Nonnull PlayerType turn, @Nonnull R roll, @Nonnull List<Move<P>> availableMoves)
      Instantiates a game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.
      Parameters:
      board - The state of the pieces on the board.
      lightPlayer - The state of the light player.
      darkPlayer - The state of the dark player.
      turn - The player who can roll the dice.
      roll - The value of the dice that was rolled that can be used as the number of places to move a piece.
      availableMoves - The moves that are available from this position using the given roll.
